Title: Relates to income requirements for the real property school tax exemption granted to certain persons sixty-five years of age or over
Summary: Relates to income requirements for the real property school tax exemption granted to certain persons sixty-five years of age or over in high-appreciation municipalities; defines "high-appreciation municipality".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to income requirements for the real property school tax exemption granted to persons sixty-five years of age or over in high-appreciation municipalities
